ACB.Name: Australian Classification Board
ACB.Description: The Australian Classification Board (ACB) is the government body responsible for the classification of films, computer games, and publications in Australia. It assigns age ratings and content warnings to ensure that media is appropriate for different audiences.

G.Name: General
G.Description: Content is suitable for all ages.

PG.Name: Parental Guidance
PG.Description: Content is suitable for children with parental guidance.

M.Name: Mature
M.Description: Content is suitable for mature audiences.

MA15.Name: Mature Accompanied 15+
MA15.Description: Content is suitable for mature audiences aged 15 and over, with parental accompaniment recommended.

R18.Name: Restricted 18+
R18.Description: Content is suitable for adults aged 18 and over.

RC.Name: Refused Classification
RC.Description: Content that is refused classification and cannot be legally sold or distributed in Australia.

CERO.Name: Computer Entertainment Rating Organization
CERO.Description: CERO is the organization responsible for rating video games in Japan. It assigns age ratings and content descriptors to ensure that games are appropriate for different audiences.

A.Name: All Ages
A.Description: Content is suitable for all ages.

B.Name: 12 and Older
B.Description: Content is suitable for ages 12 and older.

C.Name: 15 and Older
C.Description: Content is suitable for ages 15 and older.

D.Name: 17 and Older
D.Description: Content is suitable for ages 17 and older.

Z.Name: 18 and Older
Z.Description: Content is suitable for adults aged 18 and over.

CLASS_IND.Name: ClassInd
CLASS_IND.Description: ClassInd is the Brazilian classification system for video games, responsible for rating games based on their content to ensure they are appropriate for different age groups.

L.Name: Livre
L.Description: Content is suitable for all ages.

Ten.Name: 10 Anos
Ten.Description: Content is suitable for ages 10 and older.

Twelve.Name: 12 Anos
Twelve.Description: Content is suitable for ages 12 and older.

Fourteen.Name: 14 Anos
Fourteen.Description: Content is suitable for ages 14 and older.

Sixteen.Name: 16 Anos
Sixteen.Description: Content is suitable for ages 16 and older.

Eighteen.Name: 18 Anos
Eighteen.Description: Content is suitable for adults aged 18 and over.

ESRB.Name: Entertainment Software Rating Board
ESRB.Description: The ESRB is a self-regulatory organization that assigns age and content ratings to video games in North America. It provides information about the content of games to help consumers make informed choices.

EC.Name: Early Childhood
EC.Description: Content is suitable for young children.

E.Name: Everyone
E.Description: Content is suitable for all ages.

E10.Name: Everyone 10 and Older
E10.Description: Content is suitable for ages 10 and older.

M.Name: Mature
M.Description: Content is suitable for mature audiences.

AO.Name: Adults Only
AO.Description: Content is suitable for adults only, typically ages 18 and older.

GRAC.Name: Game Rating and Administration Committee
GRAC.Description: GRAC is the South Korean organization responsible for rating video games. It assigns age ratings and content descriptors to ensure that games are appropriate for different audiences.

All.Name: All Ages
All.Description: Content is suitable for all ages.

Twelve.Name: 12 and Older
Twelve.Description: Content is suitable for ages 12 and older.

Fifteen.Name: 15 and Older
Fifteen.Description: Content is suitable for ages 15 and older.

Eighteen.Name: 18 and Older
Eighteen.Description: Content is suitable for adults aged 18 and over.

Testing.Name: Testing
Testing.Description: Content is under testing and not yet rated.

PEGI.Name: Pan European Game Information
PEGI.Description: PEGI is a European video game content rating system that provides age ratings and content descriptors to help consumers make informed choices about video games.

Three.Name: Three
Three.Description: Content is suitable for all ages.

Seven.Name: Seven
Seven.Description: Content is suitable for ages 7 and older.

Twelve.Name: Twelve
Twelve.Description: Content is suitable for ages 12 and older.

Sixteen.Name: Sixteen
Sixteen.Description: Content is suitable for ages 16 and older.

Eighteen.Name: Eighteen
Eighteen.Description: Content is suitable for adults aged 18 and over.

USK.Name: Unterhaltungssoftware Selbstkontrolle
USK.Description: USK is the German video game content rating system that provides age ratings and content descriptors to help consumers make informed choices about video games.

0.Description: Content is suitable for all ages.
